title: British Isles
description:
British Isles regional formations with map interface.

 25 columns 

Approximately two dozen sub-regions, with each formation linked to the BGS lexicon; compiled in coordination with British Geological Survey, BGS.

This datapack was developed in conjunction with the British Geological Survey (especially Colin Waters; cnw@bgs.ac.uk) during 2008-2012. Migrated to GTS2020 age model in Jan 2021.
Main reference = Waters, C.N. et al (16 authors), 2007. Stratigraphical Chart of the United Kingdom: 2 sheets -- Northern Britain & Southern Britain. British Geological Survey, 2 posters.
NOTE: Each set of columns is separated by a strip 'color of time' of the international-stage divisions to clarify the temporal correlations
